text: Albertus Petrus Enricus Gerardus Westelaken (2 September 1949 - 4 June 2015), better known by his stage name Albert West, was a Dutch pop singer and record producer. He was the lead singer of The Shuffles from 1963 to 1973. He was born in 's-Hertogenbosch, North Brabant. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1949 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Dutch singers Category:Musicians from North Brabant Category:People from 's-Hertogenbosch Category:Pop singers Category:Dutch record producers
title: Albert West
